Hi, just to let you know that there is a program called testdisk that can recover data from a broken down pc - I read on another of your torrents that you had a breakdown and lost some data.

After you have downloaded testdisk and unpacked it then run Photorec and set it only to those files you like to recover - otherwise it will take forever.  

testdisk has worked fine for me for several years now.
With kind regard
JBJ
